name: Vimdesk ERP system
description: Vimdesk is an ERP system i have worked on during my internship at COTIT. I have primarily worked on the front-end made in Vue 3. I have also worked a little bit on the API, which is made in Laravel.

name: TBB Express Portal
description: TBB Express is one of my current clients. TBB has an transporter system which is made with Vue 3 and Laravel. I have primarily worked on the front-end, but i have also done some tasks which included modifying/adding things to the back-end.
